mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pwd, email, age) value(#{id},#{pwd},#{email},#{age})
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update member set lastlogin=now() where id=#{id}
update member set id=#{id}, pwd=#{pwd}, email=#{email}, age=#{age} where id=#{id}
